outline:
1. price of a life, ransom, bribe
  2. asphalt, pitch (as a covering)
  3. the henna plant, name of a plant (henna?)
  4. village
kjv_def: bribe, camphire, pitch, ransom, satisfaction, sum of money, village.
strongs_def: properly, a cover, i.e. (literally) a village (as covered in); (specifically) bitumen (as used for coating), and the henna plant (as used for dyeing); figuratively, a redemption-price
